text: Sehore Vidhan Sabha Constituency is one of the 230 assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh. It comes under Sehore district. It is a segment of Bhopal (Lok Sabha constituency). ==Members of Legislative Assembly== {| class="wikitable" style="width:80%;" |- ! style="background:#666; color:white;" colspan="2"|Year ! style="background:#666; color:white;"|Member ! style="background:#666; color:white;"|Political Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1957 || Umrao Singh || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 1962 || Inmayatullah Khan || Indian National Congress |- |style="background- color: " | || 1967 || R. Mewada || Bharatiya Jan Sangh |- |style="background- color: " | || 1972 || Aziz Qureshi || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 1977 || Savita Bajpai || Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1980 || Sunder Lal Patwa || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1985 || Shankar Lal || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 1990 || Madan Lal Tyagi || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1993 || Ramesh Saxena || Independent |- |style="background-color: " | || 1998 || Ramesh Saxena || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2003 || Ramesh Saxena || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2008 || Ramesh Saxena || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 2013 || Sudesh Rai || Independent |- |style="background-color: " | | 2018 | Sudesh Rai | Bharatiya Janata Party |- |} ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh Category:Sehore district
